product.name: B Smudged
product.description: Let your eyes naturally pop with our B Smudged, a subtle eye color that adds a tint of color to the base of your lashes. An organic, cream eye color, B Smudged eliminates the inevitable uneven line from traditional eyeliners, and does not require expert blending techniques of messy, powder-based shadows. Simply 'smudge' along lash line for color that stays in place for a long lasting look.
